LOVE this game! Somehow I have not really managed to get sick of this game and those moments when the killer is right in front of you and they can't see you is soooo tender! I haven't had the pleasure of playing with friends on this game but I'm sure it would be a hell of a lot of fun! However, it's sad that the developers have only made one gamemode which can easily make this game repetitive for some. I like how they are still releasing new players and killers and maps, but it is slowy growing stale... Anyways, GREAT game if your looking for a short 15 minute game to play!

All these negative reviews from baby survivors who can't be as toxic anymore is laughable. I don't think they realize the game is supposed to have asymmetrical balance. You're not supposed to be able to do half the shit survivors do in the first place. They have a lot of broken perks and add-ons. Killers are supposed to be the ones in control in the first place, but they're not. Exhaustion nerf isn't even that bad, And I PREFER playing survivor to killer by a long shot. It's just a shame that the devs are trying to add balance to a game that does NOT need it becuase they game genre is not supposed to be designed this way. What I think is sad, is if they keep trying to "balance" the game, especially with the changes coming after 2.1, it's going to make killers leave. Spoiler alert: If you balence it to where there's no point playing killer, killers aren't going to play anymore, and then you have a dead game. I think it'll be funny if most killer mains leave and then survivors try playing killer and see what kind of game they have created.

10/10, would buy again.
